panels.description: Incoming HTTP Requests per second for the selected endpoints and applications
panels.title: In Req / Sec

panels.description: The error rate of incoming http requests for the selected endpoints and applications
panels.title: In Error Rate

targets.expr:
sum(rate(nats_duration_count{service=~"$service", namespace="$NS", error="true"}[$__range])) by (subject)
/ 
sum(rate(nats_duration_count{service=~"$service", namespace="$NS", kind_of=~"$kind"}[$__range])) by (subject)
